price: Ẹni yín kò ṣìnà, kò sì sọnù.¹
footnotes: 1. Ènìyàn “dọlla” nígbà tí ó bá fi àìmọ̀kan sẹ̀sìn. Ènìyàn tí kò tẹ̀lé ìmọ̀ tí ó mọ̀, òun ló “gawā”. Ànábì - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - kò fi àìmọ̀kan sẹ̀sìn. Kò sì yapa ìmọ̀ tí Allāhu sọ̀kalẹ̀ fún un.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
